feed.title: Ben Jaeger's Blog
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Who's That Multimon?! Part 1 - Sprites and Dataloaders

link.title: Who's That Multimon?! Part 1 - Sprites and Dataloaders

entry.summary: Introduction A friend recently suggested it would be a fun challenge to see if you could build a neural network to identify Pokémon types using just their sprites. Given I was in the process of trying to get my head around neural networks and learning PyTorch at the time, this seemed like a fun little exercise to ease me into it! These posts will tell the story of how I got on. They’ll ideally ...
